subject: Soccer
Books and Literature
Uniforms
lead_paragraph: Raith Rovers, a soccer team in Scotland’s second division, agreed for the 2014-15 season to display on its uniforms the website of the novelist Val McDermid, who has a family connection to the club.
snippet: Raith Rovers, a soccer team in Scotland’s second division, agreed for the 2014-15 season to display on its uniforms the website of the novelist Val McDermid, who has a family connection to the club.
